structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS

law.text: No person shall damage or obstruct any improvement or waterway under the control of the board. No person shall place any floodgate, bridge or fence across the same, unless the right so to do is first obtained from the board by order entered upon its record specifying the kind of floodgate, bridge or fence, and the same shall be erected only in accordance with that order. The superintendent of drainage shall see that this section and KRS 267.470 are enforced.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2380-43.
